name: test_e2e_with_logs[017_SQLI_ADV_091]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ADV_091` |
| **Name** | PostgreSQL pg_sleep |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | advanced |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `pg_sleep(5)`
- **Encoded**: `pg_sleep%285%29`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~42000ms
